name: Rio Vista Delta Breeze: Paratransit
fullDescription: Rio Vista Delta Breeze provides ADA paratransit service for Rio Vista residents who cannot use regular bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service within Rio Vista
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the paratransit eligibility application
2. Contact Delta Breeze for application
3. Assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
keywords: Rio Vista, Delta Breeze, paratransit, ADA, Solano County, disability, wheelchair, door to door
